TopicTitle: Cruise missile controlled with the kOS mod.

Articles.Content:
Here's my second KSP video. I built a cruise missile and wrote a script to control it using the kOS scripting mod. It's capable of reaching a target up to 250 km, while hugging the terrain at 500m (including over mountains!).

Enjoy.

Enjoy.

wow, I'm trying to get my head around the basics! Does this script have anything todo with corrective steering? I'm making a basic missile, but can't figure out how to make the missile guide its progade onto the target direction and not just lock the steering to its direction will always leads to it falling short :/
